shortDescription: Help Luna get the treatment she needs.
longDescription: Luna is a gentle Labrador rescued from a roadside accident. She requires urgent surgery and aftercare. Your generous support will help Luna walk again and find a loving forever home.
Milo is a playful kitten found abandoned in a park. He needs vaccinations, proper food, and basic health checks. Every bit you donate helps keep Milo healthy and happy.

shortDescription: Help Coco get ready for adoption.
longDescription: Coco is a rescued bird with a broken wing. We are working on her rehabilitation so she can be adopted into a safe environment. Your donation helps cover her vet and care expenses.
Buddy, a loving Golden Retriever, was found severely malnourished. He is currently under treatment. Help us feed and care for him so he can be adopted by a loving family.
Snowball is a friendly rabbit who needs neutering and routine vet care. Your contribution will help reduce unwanted pet populations and prepare Snowball for his forever home.
